body_html: Hello! Adding checks for sizes would be good. The thing I think it's really necessary is that behaviour in the 'with_logits' version is exactly the same as the one on probabilities [for BCE and non-binary CE]. The main thing that was worrisome to me was that a shape mismatch affected one and not the other. Cheers :)
body_text: Hello! Adding checks for sizes would be good. The thing I think it's really necessary is that behaviour in the 'with_logits' version is exactly the same as the one on probabilities [for BCE and non-binary CE]. body: Hello! Adding checks for sizes would be good. The thing I think it's really necessary is that behaviour in the 'with_logits' version is exactly the same as the one on probabilities [for BCE and non-binary CE]. The main thing that was worrisome to me was that a shape mismatch affected one and not the other. Cheers :)
